refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: covWrite("html", dir) covWrite("binary", binaryFile) covWrite("html", binaryFile, dir)

listitem.para: exports the coverage data as HTML files
store the coverage data as binary for later use
stored binary filename as a string

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This command is used to export, store or "load and export" runtime instrumentation data to the file system. The major usage is to export the current runtime information to HTML files on a directory using covWrite("html", "TMPDIR/coverage").
This command is used to export, store or "load and export" runtime instrumentation data to the file system.

refsection.title: Basic example
refsection.programlisting: covStart(isempty) // instrument isempty by macro value for i=1:1e5; isempty(i); end // run covWrite("html", "TMPDIR/coverage") // write runtime information to a directory covStop(); // remove any instrumentation
